title: Week Review: Complex Sentence Nesting
goal: Demonstrate mastery of complex nested structures.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

All 8 vocabulary words:

think → ?       study → ?
learn → ?       teach → ?
science → ?     idea → ?
important → ?   difficult → ?

(Answers: jinvi, tadni, cilre, ctuca, saske, sidbo, vajni, nandu)

Grammar Summary (3-4 min)

Nesting Tools

Tool Function
lo du'u Proposition abstraction
lo nu Event abstraction
tu'a Implicit abstraction
se/te Conversion (works inside abstractions)
poi/noi Relative clauses (can nest)

Parsing Strategy

  1. Find main selbri
  2. Identify abstraction boundaries
  3. Note conversions
  4. Trace relative clauses

Week 26 Vocabulary

Lojban English Lojban English
jinvi think/opine tadni study
cilre learn ctuca teach
saske science sidbo idea
vajni important nandu difficult

Self-Test (5-6 min)

Part A: Vocabulary (8 points)

Translate:

  1. jinvi →
  2. cilre →
  3. saske →
  4. vajni →

Translate to Lojban:

  1. study →
  2. teach →
  3. idea →
  4. difficult →
Answers
  1. think/opine
  2. learn
  3. science
  4. important
  5. tadni
  6. ctuca
  7. sidbo
  8. nandu

Part B: Nesting (8 points)

Translate:

  1. I know that you study.
  2. Alice thinks that learning is important.
  3. I want something involving the book. (use tu'a)
  4. Being taught is difficult.

Parse (identify levels):

  1. mi djuno lo du'u do djica lo nu klama
  2. la .alis. cu jinvi lo du'u lo nu tadni cu vajni
Answers
  1. mi djuno lo du'u do tadni
  2. la .alis. cu jinvi lo du'u lo nu cilre cu vajni
  3. mi djica tu'a lo cukta
  4. lo nu se ctuca cu nandu
  5. Level 1: mi djuno, Level 2: do djica, Level 3: klama (I know that you want to go)
  6. Level 1: la .alis. jinvi, Level 2: lo nu tadni cu vajni (Alice thinks that studying is important)

Part C: Complex Sentences (4 points)

Translate:

  1. I happily know that the person who teaches you thinks that learning Lojban is important.
  2. Alice believes that the science which Bob studies is difficult.
Answers
  1. .ui mi djuno lo du'u lo prenu poi ke'a ctuca do cu jinvi lo du'u lo nu cilre la .jbobau. cu vajni
  2. la .alis. cu krici lo du'u lo saske poi la .bob. cu tadni ke'a cu nandu

Integration Challenge (1-2 min)

Build the most complex sentence you can:

Use:

  • Nested abstractions (2-3 levels)
  • tu'a OR conversion (se/te)
  • A relative clause
  • An attitudinal

Example:

.ui mi djuno lo du'u lo prenu poi ke'a ctuca mi cu jinvi lo du'u lo nu tadni la .jbobau. cu vajni je nandu

(Happily, I know that the person who teaches me thinks that studying Lojban is important and difficult.)

Week 26 Complete Reference

Vocabulary (8):

Lojban English Lojban English
jinvi think tadni study
cilre learn ctuca teach
saske science sidbo idea
vajni important nandu difficult

Grammar:

Tool Use
Nested du'u/nu Multi-level thoughts
tu'a Implicit abstraction
se/te in abstraction Perspective shift
poi in du'u Relative clauses inside

Cumulative vocabulary: ~212 words

Summary

You completed Week 26 on complex nesting. You can now express multi-layered thoughts with nested abstractions, conversion, and relative clauses.

Next week preview: Week 27 is a practice week — everyday conversations using all your tools.
